{{Actor| | type = Explosive | name = SpectralLightningDeath1 | class = SpectralLightningDeath1 | game = Strife }}[[Classes]]: [[Classes:SpectralLightningBase|SpectralLightningBase]]→SpectralLightningDeath1

A variant of [[Classes:SpectralLightningBase|SpectralLightningBase]] that skips the first frame of it's death animation. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR SpectralLightningDeath1 : [[Classes:SpectralLightningBase|SpectralLightningBase]] { States { Death: Goto Super::Death+1 } }
